attributes.action: Strengthen the definition of a disability hate crime.
attributes.additional_details: The definition does not fully look at the nature of the crime and is ambiguous in how it is explained.
attributes.background: Disability hate crime is under reported and under prosecuted due to the definition not reflecting the nature of the crime.

rejection.details:
This petition does not set out exactly what changes to the law are being requested.

You may wish to consult the Law Commission's 2014 review of hate crime law before submitting a redrafted petition:
http://www.lawcom.gov.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/lc348_hate_crime_english_summary.pdf
